meanings.definition: A person who serves as the public face or spokesperson for a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: The frontman of the company greeted the guests at the event.
meanings.sent2: The frontman of the band introduced the new album to the fans.
meanings.sent3: The frontman of the team made the announcement with a big smile.
meanings.sent4: She was the frontman of the charity, spreading kindness wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The frontman's charisma and confidence captivated the audience.

meanings.definition: The leader or principal member of a musical group who typically sings lead vocals and interacts with the audience.
meanings.sent1: The talented frontman wowed the crowd with his powerful voice.
meanings.sent2: The frontman energized the concert with his dynamic performance.
meanings.sent3: The frontman joked with the fans between songs, keeping the mood light.
meanings.sent4: His presence on stage was like a beacon, drawing everyone's attention to him.
meanings.sent5: The frontman's passion for music was evident in every note he sang.
